            <entry>cahi1:data_174c0873065302e87fc989146b0a3590293fcd13</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The function of a fuse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Funktion einer Sicherung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fonction d'un fusible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A função de um fusível</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La funzione di un fusibile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η λειτουργία μιας θρυαλλίδας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La función de un fusible</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show how fuse wires function in normal circuits with normal currents (top) and faulty circuits with high currents (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical safety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plugs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen, wie Sicherung Funktion 
in den normalen Stromkreisen mit den normalen Strömen (ober) und in 
den fehlerhaften Stromkreisen mit hohen Strömen (Unterseite) 
verdrahtet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent comment le fusible 
câble la fonction dans les circuits normaux avec les courants normaux
(supérieurs) et des circuits défectueux avec les courants élevés 
(bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram como o fusível wires 
a função em circuitos normais com as correntes normais (superiores) 
e em circuitos defeituosos com correntes elevadas (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano come il fusibile 
lega la funzione in circuiti normali con le correnti normali 
(superiori) e circuiti difettosi con le alte correnti (parte 
inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις επιδεικνύουν πώς τα καλώδια 
θρυαλλίδων λειτουργούν στα κανονικά κυκλώματα με τα κανονικά 
ρεύματα (κορυφή) και τα ελαττωματικά κυκλώματα με τα υψηλά 
ρεύματα (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran cómo el fusible ata 
con alambre la función en circuitos normales con las corrientes 
normales (superiores) y circuitos defectuosos con las altas 
corrientes (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktuell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Sicherheit</string>
          </keyword>
